name: Dekstop Dinosaurs 🦕
description:
Desktop Dinosaurs is a Tamagotchi like type of game. Jump into the cretacious to raise dinosaurs directly on your Windows desktop.

Features 🦕
  • See your dinosaurs live (eat, sleep, die...) inside on your windows desktop
  • 1 species of dinosaur currently available 
  • Your progression is saved
  • Name your dinosaurs
  • Randomly generated  dinosaur colors sets inspired by NES console color palette
  • Buy new dinosaurs eggs
Stretch goals 🦖

I will provide more content into the game once each of this step are reached. 

  • $100 —> More environment variety and possibility to buy plants, flowers to customize your dinosaurs environment.
  • $200 —> Add 1 dinosaur: Triceratops
  • $300 —> The game will be released on Steam (free key for itch.io buyers)
  • $400 —> Add 1 dinosaur: Ankylosaurus
  • $500 —> Add 1 dinosaur: Parasaurolophus
  • $600 —> Add 5 new colors sets
  • $700 —> Add 1 dinosaur: Brachiosaurus
  • $800 —> Add interaction with dinosaurs : play, pet...
  • $900 —> Add 1 dinosaur: Iguanodon
  • $1 000 —> Add 1 dinosaur: Tyrannosaurus
  • $2 000 —> Dinosaur interactions : fight, love, couple...
